item.title: My Process for Building Data Visualizations
item.description: Story by Data offers weekly challenges in the area of data. I am excited to find out about the challenges and participated for the first time this week. Story by Data Weekly Challenge: “Describe your process or work-flow for creating data visualizations / dashboards”
